title: iRobot Braava™ - How to Use Cube to Cube Navigation
description: iRobot Braava - How to Use Cube to Cube Navigation

asset.author: iRobot
asset.hookText: iRobot Braava™ - How to Use Cube to Cube Navigation

transcripts: The northstar navigation cube acts as a beacon emitting a signal that guides Braava cleaning. Use additional cubes to expand how far Braava 380 cleans in a single run. To enable cube to cube navigation place additional cubes in rooms or areas next to the area covered by the first cub. The cube should typically be between six and seven meters from each other for the north star coverage to overlap Braava 380 will automatically clean from one cube to another.
